Hey guys,

In junit4 cvs, I noticed the following change:

http://cvs.sourc=
eforge.net/viewcvs.py/junit/junit/org/junit/internal/runners/Attic/TestMeth=
odRunner.java?r1=3D1.1.2.5&r2=3D1.1.2.6&only_with_tag=3DVersion4

which all=
ows the expected exception to be a base class of the actual
one. This diffe=
rs from the NUnit behavior:

http://nunit.org/index.php?p=3Dexception&r=3D2=
.2.6

When writing a test, I usually want to make sure the program throws
t=
he *EXACT* type of exception I specify, not that it throws some
random subc=
lass.

-- Ben
